q: In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly," Eric Schmidt , the company's current CEO, said in a blog posted on Google's Web site. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead.
